concept.title: Stub (or Summary) Topics with Generated Content

p.draft-comment: Describe stub or disambiguation topics that use generated child topic short descriptions. Show how collection-type attribute affects the way these child topics are listed. Refer to Swinburne DITA strategy if necessary, or use the Collection Type Examples parent node from this Maps chapter. Screen captures of the different results would be useful. Perhaps move some content from discussion of shortdesc in the Exegesis.
There is a reference to generated summary content in (stub) parent topics in Hierarchical Linking Relationships.
